name: Sunless Horizon
description:
Controls

  • Hold Left Click: Charge your slingshot
    • Abort with Right Click
    • You can invert the launch direction with I
  • While on a planet, use W/S or Arrows Left/Right to move across the surface
  • Advance dialogue with the on-screen button, or E or Space

You are a spark, a powerful fragment of vision. It is up to you to pay the ultimate price: The fate of the universe; Born anew out of the gifts you give to it after its soon-to-be-former inhabitants give you theirs.

  • Explore a wonderfully constructed solar system!
  • Meet cool NPCs!
  • Decide the fate of the new universe!

Credits

Programming, Visual Design, Sound Design (Sourced under CC0 via freesound.org): Snek - itch.io, Twitter

Writing, Game Design: Jaa'm - itch.io, Twitter
